verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, A Song <WH7892> or Psalm <WH4210>. Make a joyful noise <WH7321> <WH8685> unto 'Elohim <WH430>, all ye lands <WH776>:
Sing forth <WH2167> <WH8761> the honour <WH3519> of his name <WH8034>: make <WH7760> <WH8798> his praise <WH8416> glorious <WH3519>.

Say <WH559> <WH8798> unto 'Elohim <WH430>, How terrible <WH3372> <WH8737> art thou in thy works <WH4639> ! through the greatness <WH7230> of thy power <WH5797> shall thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> submit <WH3584> <WH8762> themselves unto thee.
All the earth <WH776> shall worship <WH7812> <WH8691> thee, and shall sing <WH2167> <WH8762> unto thee; they shall sing <WH2167> <WH8762> to thy name <WH8034>. Selah <WH5542>.
Come <WH3212> <WH8798> and see <WH7200> <WH8798> the works <WH4659> of 'Elohim <WH430>: he is terrible <WH3372> <WH8737> in his doing <WH5949> toward the children <WH1121> of men <WH120>.
He turned <WH2015> <WH8804> the sea <WH3220> into dry <WH3004> land: they went <WH5674> <WH8799> through the flood <WH5104> on foot <WH7272>: there did we rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799> in him.

He ruleth <WH4910> <WH8802> by his power <WH1369> for ever <WH5769>; his eyes <WH5869> behold <WH6822> <WH8799> the nations <WH1471>: let not the rebellious <WH5637> <WH8802> exalt <WH7311> <WH8799> <WH8675> <WH7311> <WH8686> themselves. Selah <WH5542>.
O bless <WH1288> <WH8761> our 'Elohim <WH430>, ye people <WH5971>, and make the voice <WH6963> of his praise <WH8416> to be heard <WH8085> <WH8685>:
Which holdeth <WH7760> <WH8802> our soul <WH5315> in life <WH2416>, and suffereth <WH5414> <WH8804> not our feet <WH7272> to be moved <WH4132>.
For thou, O 'Elohim <WH430>, hast proved <WH974> <WH8804> us: thou hast tried <WH6884> <WH8804> us, as silver <WH3701> is tried <WH6884> <WH8800>.
Thou broughtest <WH935> <WH8689> us into the net <WH4686>; thou laidst <WH7760> <WH8804> affliction <WH4157> upon our loins <WH4975>.

Thou hast caused men <WH582> to ride <WH7392> <WH8689> over our heads <WH7218>; we went <WH935> <WH8804> through fire <WH784> and through water <WH4325>: but thou broughtest us out <WH3318> <WH8686> into a wealthy <WH7310> place.
I will go <WH935> <WH8799> into thy house <WH1004> with burnt offerings <WH5930>: I will pay <WH7999> <WH8762> thee my vows <WH5088>,
Which my lips <WH8193> have uttered <WH6475> <WH8804>, and my mouth <WH6310> hath spoken <WH1696> <WH8765>, when I was in trouble <WH6862>.

I will offer <WH5927> <WH8686> unto thee burnt sacrifices <WH5930> of fatlings <WH4220>, with the incense <WH7004> of rams <WH352>; I will offer <WH6213> <WH8799> bullocks <WH1241> with goats <WH6260>. Selah <WH5542>.
Come <WH3212> <WH8798> and hear <WH8085> <WH8798>, all ye that fear <WH3373> 'Elohim <WH430>, and I will declare <WH5608> <WH8762> what he hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> for my soul <WH5315>.
I cried <WH7121> <WH8804> unto him with my mouth <WH6310>, and he was extolled <WH7311> <WH8785> <WH8676> <WH7318> <WH8785> with <WH8478> my tongue <WH3956>.
If I regard <WH7200> <WH8804> iniquity <WH205> in my heart <WH3820>, the YY <WH136> will not hear <WH8085> <WH8799> me:
But verily <WH403> 'Elohim <WH430> hath heard <WH8085> <WH8804> me; he hath attended <WH7181> <WH8689> to the voice <WH6963> of my prayer <WH8605>.
Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be 'Elohim <WH430>, which hath not turned away <WH5493> <WH8689> my prayer <WH8605>, nor his mercy <WH2617> from me.
